relation: Darrow - #70 For Sale - One Exit Mouse. Helps every now and then, but is prone to spending all of your money and eating all of your food. Nifty shades included.
Darrow - #71 With the pencil statue erased, it's time to move on! Unfortunately for Ness, that means he is now subjected to Peaceful Rest Valley's trials.
Darrow - #72 Fighting his way through the valley, Ness is caught off guard and...given a cold. What despicable tactics.

Darrow - #73 Ness encounters one of the worst things the valley has to offer: Territorial Oaks. And boy are they territorial! Fortunately, in a somewhat stranger turn, a bomb resides in a present not far away.

Darrow - #74 Ness discovers the misfortune of fighting suicidal enemies and is blown high into the sky. I guess we'll never discover just who started the fire. It was always burning since the world was turning, I suppose.
textBeforeTable: > T P M G F B A < Other Submissions by Darrow Remembering Picky's motto, Ness suddenly awakens to a new possiblity.
